name: Wooden Blocks Build
description:
Can you imagine being able to make your own world with wood pieces😍? Enter this fun adventure and set free your imagination.

    Wooden Blocks build is a child👶 safe game to express your creativity building anything you can do with wood pieces.

    With Wooden Blocks Build kids can make you own world using wooden pieces. Stack as many as you can and build you city, medieval castle or mix them to make something wonderful.

    Wooden Blocks Build is a free game🎮 with the possibility to purchase new themes and play with it.

The available themes are:

  • Wooden Blocks Build Theme🏫
  • City Theme🏙
  • Medieval Theme🏰

    Each theme has new colors that kids will have so much fun. The magic is on your firgertips with Wooden Blocks Build🎮.  Kids can use the game to develop theys creativity and motor skills while moving the pieces.

Nice fun everbody!
